lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I don't have much but its a lot more then many others have.
lender.occupational_info: I design Apps for mobile devices such as the iPhone, iPad and Android.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I can. My wife loans because she feels it is her honor and duty to help others live better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the fight against organized corruption and insurance fraud.

lender.name: Sibylle
lender.loan_because: I am thankful that I have the privilege to live in a first world country and therefore I love to support the not-so-privileged in this world in an effective way. "Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime".

lender.name: Sarah and Justin
lender.loan_because: No one does it alone.

lender.name: susan & christian
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people get started or expand their businesses. We like the personalised aspect of micro-loans as well.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to live as I do, and I feel it is my obligation to help those who are not as fortunate.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: In my past, I have needed and someone else helped me. I want to help someone else. It's a blessing to be able to help others, even when I need help myself. I am sure I am a better person for it.
lender.occupational_info: I sing songs to make others feel inspired to be whatever they want to be. I act on stage because I was born to do it.

lender.name: Jean-Claude
lender.loan_because: I believe that everybody deserves a chance willing to do more than just waiting.
lender.occupational_info: I am interested in host / parasite interaction on the molecular level.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because:
I support the fundamentals of microcredit - helping people help themselves. This is NOT CHARITY!
"A whole lotta littles make a whole lotta lots." ~ Stevie Wonder

lender.occupational_info:
I work in an office in a 50-story building in downtown Denver.
The photo was taken 1/25/2010 on the top of a mountain at Red Rock's Park in Morrison, CO. Denver is in the background.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.occupational_info: CapLinked helps companies and investors connect and share with each other.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner I know the value of having people that believe in me. And having belief backed up with money is the ultimate entrepreneur's dream.
lender.occupational_info: I own a retail store in Portland, Oregon. I sell luxury European bedding, towels and personal care items.

lender.name: John and Kathleen
lender.loan_because: Trying to help people in developing or depressed countries

lender.name: The Sanders Family
lender.loan_because: how could we not?
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer and crunch numbers, design manuals and presentations, and generally just keep everyone in my company going where they need to go! My husband is in charge of all the "city" trees and takes care of their pruning, planning, and planting. We are the proud parents of 4 children.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurs are cool.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I can, I love the world and the people in it. Money distribution is off. How can I help the best?
lender.occupational_info: I build community. I work in a shared home for people with developmental disabilities. I also work with Canadian aboriginal youth, providing activities, and support.

lender.name: Antonio & Louie
lender.loan_because: We both would like to help someone out, who wants to make a change in their lives.....for the better. And sometimes people just need a little extra help! We look forward to helping others.
lender.occupational_info: We both attend a High School in Phoenix, Arizona in the USA. We are looking forward to college in the upcoming years.

lender.name: May
lender.loan_because: I support entrepreneurs who have a plan and a commitment to help themselves. I want to see them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I like to help self employed business owners grow.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: God has showered our family with blessings and we want to share those blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze data about credit cards and debit cards to identify trends in how people pay for goods and services.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to succeed

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Chelsea Hart

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Even one person can change the world with the right resources. I hope to help provide them.
lender.occupational_info: I go to classes where I learn about humanity as I work to better understand Psychology.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I am able to
lender.occupational_info: I run a small farm that teaches kids about food.

lender.name: Theo
lender.loan_because: Some people don't have much and they might be sad.
lender.occupational_info: In kindergarten I play and read books and run in the gym. My favourite part is playing in the house centre. I love school.

lender.name: Johannes
lender.loan_because: I like the idea to enable people to make themselves a better living.

lender.name: Christa
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful, low-cost way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I've worked for publishers large and small, helping authors to shape their ideas and words into books.

lender.name: Elisabeth L.
lender.loan_because: I set up this account in memorial for my sister Elisabeth. She was in a wheelchair since birth - deaf-mute. A wonderfully cheerful woman with a great sense of humour. The rest of her bank account cannot be spent in a better way than loaning with Kiva...... Spent again and again and again......

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: It is a great blessing for me to be involved with Kiva entrepreneurs. When I see what they accomplish with the small amount I am able to give, it brings me a lot of joy.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for paying the workers at my company.

lender.name: Trinity UMC
lender.loan_because: We began loaning on Kiva in response to an appeal one Mother's Day, when we learned that investing in women builds up entire communities. We took a collection in church in honor of our own mothers, and began giving to help women and girls around the world. We believe that all people are part of God's family, and our faith compels us to reach out to others in love and service.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I can. Because I lived in South America for two years where the statistics that defined poverty in my undergraduate days transformed into faces and names of friends, neighbors, and students. KIVA provides a contrast to the often bleak picture of poverty and instead allows us to focus on where hope is greatest: in individuals.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: The choices we make in regards to business and sustainability affect 3rd world countries the most-- but that doesn't have to be a negative thing. :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student from California studying environmental policy and marketing

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to help people help themselves -

lender.name: Nickolas
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that if other countries, that don't have much to work with, were able to revieve loans to get their buisnesses started; this would alow those buisnesses to boom. Thus, allowing other countries to grow.

lender.name: Kevin Butler
lender.loan_because: I try to do as much as I can to help others, it's the least I can do. Everyone could use a little help now and then, so I try to do my part.
lender.occupational_info: I currently attend college at SUNY Morrisville in Norwich, New York. It's my second semester and I'm taking classes in US History and College Skills for Adults. I hope to one day become a full-time student and study something I truly enjoy.

lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I feel that those who are trying to pull themselves out of poverty deserve to be lent money to help them do so. I believe that people should work for their money, and this seems to be a great charity for that.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the university level. When I am not studying, I work part-time at a local movie theatre.

lender.name: Bala

lender.name: Mickey

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: we're all in this boat together, and small businesses rock!

lender.name: Das Mitch
lender.loan_because: I believe that to whom much is given much is expected. That we are all connected. Abundance and prosperity is simply a form of energy that we all can easily tap into. It is only our own concepts of lack and scarcity that separate us from the truth of what is truly available. When we give from the heart we tap into the limitlessness of existence.
lender.occupational_info: I provide alternative financial support to businesses that have chosen to find a different way to gain working capital.

lender.name: Dion
lender.loan_because: I would like to support others who are aspiring to make a positive change in their lives and the lives of others. I see the importance of Community Stewardship and want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Help create business partnerships with various companies to create new business activities and ventures.

lender.name: bfdboston
lender.loan_because: It was given to me as a gift and had no choice
lender.occupational_info: Productive and lucrative

lender.name: Hung
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance at a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently my second year of three of an M.Div program at the Jesuit School of Theology in Berkeley, CA. When I am done I hope to go into campus ministry.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Helping people to provide for themselves is a million times better than making them dependant on donations. All they need is a little boost at the beginning.
lender.occupational_info: I am a government agent that enforces the laws of the area.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I think microfinancing is a great tool for helping people, and it's something I can actually do while a student.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student.

lender.name: tina
lender.loan_because: this was a Christmas gift and really, I don't need any more socks! great gift idea; more folks should consider it.

lender.name: Florin
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people out of love for Jesus and because everything I have belongs to God. He told me to help others and I'm doing it in obedience to him and for his glory.
lender.occupational_info: I serve God as a senior pastor in a local church in W.Australia. My family and I come from a developing country but God brought us to Australia and blessed us. Now we can help others more.

lender.name: Conny
lender.loan_because: I really believe in microloans as a way of helping entrepreneural people helping themselves and their community to a better life.

lender.name: Wenpouir
lender.loan_because: Je prte parce que mon espoir est d'agrandir mon entreprise pour pouvoir sortir ma tte de l'eau tant dans un pays pauvre comme le notre qui class parmis les trois derniers pays les plus pauvres au monde. Mon rve est d'avoir une entreprise comptitive sur le march burkinab voir mondial et pouvoir assurer l'avenir de mes enfants en matire de scolarisation et qu'ils ne s'arrtent pas en si bon chemin comme moi qui n'a paseu la chance d'aller loin l'cole par faute de moyens financiers de mes parents.

lender.name: kristina
lender.loan_because: I need $800 to expand my business further and to be able to educate my child. As a single mother, without parents, because my parents left me at an early age, they had me adopted. It is hard to raise a daughter alone with no one to help you..I hope Kiva could help me through...Thank you..
lender.occupational_info: I've only started my business as a freelance events planner and at weekends, I am a private tutor for kids. My monthly income is 15-30K a month depending on my clients. I have 1 child, who is 2 years old and will be needing a good education.

lender.name: rodger
lender.loan_because: I have heard about this for several years and wanted to try it.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain cellular phone service across the United States of America.

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in ending hunger and poverty on our planet, to have things that historically haven't moved now move, and where a new reality is emerging.
lender.occupational_info: I owned and managed a manufacturing business with my eldest daughter, and have now retired from that. Currently, I sew and make quilts, and play the piano.

lender.loan_because: my daughter gave me a gift certificate for Christmas 2009. What a "pay it forward" thought!
lender.occupational_info: I take family friendly pets into my home when their owners are away.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: People have helped me along the way. I want to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people use high-tech maps to do their jobs better.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I am but one person, yet still I am one.
lender.occupational_info: I learn more everyday.

lender.name: brooks
lender.loan_because: It may be a small amount to me but it makes a huge difference to someone less fortunate

lender.name: $20challengeteam
lender.loan_because: along with a group from my church, we desire to share the financial blessings we've received to show love to others across the globe. We seek to pay it forward time after time and make kingdom investments. Thanks Kiva!

lender.name: Milk River Elementary
lender.loan_because: We want our students to know what it is to be true global citizens.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe the only sustainable way of development is empowerment and entrepreneurship. For that you need security and capital. Lending is preferable to aid because it provides an incitament to run a business that creates true profit.
lender.occupational_info: As a management consultant I help people in thier business, by helping them setting goals and fine the right path to achive them.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Hard work deserves a reward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Search and Rescue volunteer - that others may live.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my own successes through the people around me and the situations afforded to me so it is my civic duty to share the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I help market services to increase sales.

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: I would hope that if I were in need that people would loan to me, and give me a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my home and children.

lender.name: Carpinteria High School
lender.loan_because: We want to learn about microfinance and help with human development.

lender.name: Ahmed
lender.loan_because: I've been given too much not to

lender.occupational_info: Digital marketing for a financial institution.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because:
American, retired and living in Natal, Brazil. President of an NGO (ONG) working with communities in the interior or Brazil (30 uears). Tourism (22 years) and Family Agriculure. Resident of Brazil since 1979. Retired Merchant Marine Captain with experience working in over 65 countries. Projetista registered IBAMA Ministrio do MeioAmbiente as (como) Tcnico Federal N 235492 Uso de Recursos Naturais /utilizao do patrimnio natural; Turismo / complexos tursticos e delazer, inclusive parques temticos
Founder of the daily newsletter (YAHOO) and BLOGS Americans Living in Brazil
Owner of Ande Turismo Ltda (Tour Agency) and president of NGO/ONG Association ABTC-BRASIL (Brazilian Travel Club) - a non-profit organization dedicated to furthering the exchange of information among travelers and promoting responsible travel and sustainable family agriculture in Brazil and South America.
"I wanted to work for a company that is part of a society and contributes to it. I wanted to invest, but I also wanted something to believe in.."
"You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand." -- Woodrow Wilson, 28th president of US.
And I remembered my dream from decades ago: to establish a mecca for the international traveler, a community where we were the "natives", where we didn't feel like foreigners, where we all could do something, where nobody would have to be afraid of the question "What do you do?", where nobody would feel as though he were incomplete or unnecessary or a burden, where we would feel whole and in control and useful and wanted, and from where WE could enrich the world.
-- When you give up your dreams, you die. -- If you do not have a dream, your motivation for living is already dead. -- Dare to dream! -- After you have visualized your dream, dedicate yourself to making your dreams a reality. -- Above everything else, enjoy today. -- Tomorrow is not promised to anyone. -- If it's not healthy and fun, don't do it. -- It's your life, live it to the fullest.
"Going that extra mile for our customers or members isnt an obligation - its just what we do."
lender.occupational_info:
Permaculture & Sustainable Agriculture , MANDALLAS e AGRONEGOCIOS SCHOOL (ESCOLA) PERMACULTURE - Acari, Rio Grande do Norte www.acari-rn.com.br/permaculture.htm
Languages - English and Portuguese

lender.occupational_info: I have retail shop, rrunning successfully in houston tx, I am selling pre-paid sell phones and Accessories, my shop is on rent , I am self employed with 1 full time employ, but in this recession period business is very slow & I need some amount for back up and Invetories.
